note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: eLabFTW
tagline: Lab manager, experiment notebook, database for research labs
body:
Welcome,

eLabFTW is what you need if you want to keep track of your experiments better than other «paper labs».

It is a database, it is a lab notebook and it is free.

```
$ ssh your_server
$ cd /var/www
$ git clone https://github.com/NicolasCARPi/elabftw.git
$ cd elabftw
$ less install/INSTALL.README
```
ENJOY ! :D
